result: A) The text mentions that the word flu came to us after a series of contagion between languages, which suggests that it was not always used in this way.B) The text states that the influenza epidemic departed from Italy in 1743, which implies that there were other places where it occurred as well.C) The text mentions that the first term derived from the influence of medieval Latin, which means "influence of stars on men," which suggests that this meaning was not always associated with flu.D) The text states that the second is only the nominal form of the gripper verb, which implies that there are other forms of the word that have different meanings.E) “It is supposed to refer to violent mode as the virus takes over the infected organism.”
